original_text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds: but when it is grown, it is the greatest among herbs, and becometh a tree, so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof.
korean_text: 이는 모든 씨보다 작은 것이로되 자란 후에는 풀보다 커서 나무가 되매 공중의 새들이 와서 그 가지에 깃들이느니라

sentences.original_text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 실로 모든 씨 중에서 가장 작은 것이니

sentences.original_text: it is the greatest among herbs
so that the birds of the air come
and lodge in the branches thereof
